+00002700: 0a23 2323 2320 506f 7365 2064 6574 6563  .#### Pose detec

+000026f0: 2323 2048 6f77 2069 7420 776f 726b 730a  ## How it works.
+00002700: 0a23 2323 2320 506f 7365 2064 6574 6563  .#### Pose detec
+00002710: 7469 6f6e 3a0a 0a42 6c61 7a65 506f 7365  tion:..BlazePose
+00002720: 206f 7220 4f70 656e 506f 7365 2061 7265   or OpenPose are
+00002730: 2075 7365 6420 746f 2064 6574 6563 7420   used to detect 
+00002740: 6a6f 696e 7420 6365 6e74 6572 7320 6672  joint centers fr
+00002750: 6f6d 2061 2076 6964 656f 2e0a 0a2d 2049  om a video...- I
+00002760: 6620 6042 6c61 7a65 506f 7365 6020 6973  f `BlazePose` is
+00002770: 2075 7365 642c 206f 6e6c 7920 6f6e 6520   used, only one 
+00002780: 7065 7273 6f6e 2063 616e 2062 6520 6465  person can be de
+00002790: 7465 6374 6564 2e5c 0a20 204e 6f20 696e  tected.\.  No in
+000027a0: 7465 7270 6f6c 6174 696f 6e20 6e6f 7220  terpolation nor 
+000027b0: 6669 6c74 6572 696e 6720 6f70 7469 6f6e  filtering option
+000027c0: 7320 6172 6520 6176 6169 6c61 626c 652e  s are available.
+000027d0: 204e 6f74 2070 6c6f 7474 696e 6720 6176   Not plotting av
+000027e0: 6169 6c61 626c 652e 0a0a 2d20 4966 2060  ailable...- If `
+000027f0: 4f70 656e 506f 7365 6020 6973 2075 7365  OpenPose` is use
+00002800: 642c 206d 756c 7469 706c 6520 7065 7273  d, multiple pers
+00002810: 6f6e 7320 6361 6e20 6265 2063 6f6e 7369  ons can be consi
+00002820: 7374 656e 746c 7920 6465 7465 6374 6564  stently detected
+00002830: 2061 6372 6f73 7320 6672 616d 6573 2e20   across frames. 
+00002840: 4120 7065 7273 6f6e 2069 7320 6d61 7463  A person is matc
+00002850: 6865 6420 746f 2061 6e6f 7468 6572 2069  hed to another i
+00002860: 6e20 7468 6520 6e65 7874 2066 7261 6d65  n the next frame
+00002870: 2077 6865 6e20 7468 6569 7220 6176 6572   when their aver
+00002880: 6167 6520 706f 696e 7420 636c 6f75 6473  age point clouds
+00002890: 2061 7265 2061 7420 6120 736d 616c 6c20   are at a small 
+000028a0: 6575 636c 6964 6961 6e20 6469 7374 616e  euclidian distan
+000028b0: 6365 2e5c 0a20 2053 6571 7565 6e63 6573  ce.\.  Sequences
+000028c0: 206f 6620 6d69 7373 696e 6720 6461 7461   of missing data
+000028d0: 2061 7265 2069 6e74 6572 706f 6c61 7465   are interpolate
+000028e0: 6420 6966 2074 6865 7920 6172 6520 6c65  d if they are le
+000028f0: 7373 2074 6861 6e20 4e20 6672 616d 6573  ss than N frames
+00002900: 206c 6f6e 672e 5c0a 2020 5265 7375 6c74   long.\.  Result
+00002910: 696e 6720 636f 6f72 6469 6e61 7465 7320  ing coordinates 
+00002920: 6361 6e20 6265 2066 696c 7465 7265 6420  can be filtered 
+00002930: 7769 7468 2042 7574 7465 7277 6f72 7468  with Butterworth
+00002940: 2c20 6761 7573 7369 616e 2c20 6d65 6469  , gaussian, medi
+00002950: 616e 2c20 6f72 206c 6f65 7373 2066 696c  an, or loess fil
+00002960: 7465 722e 2054 6865 7920 6361 6e20 616c  ter. They can al
+00002970: 736f 2062 6520 706c 6f74 7465 642e 0a0a  so be plotted...
+00002980: 0a23 2323 2320 416e 676c 6520 636f 6d70  .#### Angle comp
+00002990: 7574 6174 696f 6e3a 0a0a 4a6f 696e 7420  utation:..Joint 
+000029a0: 616e 6420 7365 676d 656e 7420 616e 676c  and segment angl
+000029b0: 6573 2061 7265 2063 6f6d 7075 7465 6420  es are computed 
+000029c0: 6672 6f6d 2063 7376 2070 6f73 6974 696f  from csv positio
